Fist Griff was a member of the Flaming Fist, and secretly a True Soul of the Cult of the Absolute, who served the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Griff was a fair-skinned, blonde, and brown-eyed human woman. She wore a leather armor uniform of the Flaming Fist, armed with a heavy crossbow.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Fist Griff could be found in or near Bloomridge Park in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate. If she were to meet the group of adventurers known as the Absolute Adversaries, following an attempted massacre of the cultist followers of Bhaal, Griffs illithid tadpole would become a way for the Absolute itself to communicate with its enemies, leading to Fist Griffs death.
